00073 static int planes_contain_v3(float (*planes)[4], int totplane, const float p[3])
00074 {
00075     int i;
00076 
00077     for (i = 0; i < totplane; i++) {
00078         if (dot_v3v3(planes[i], p) + planes[i][3] > 0)
00079             return 0;
00080     }
00081 
00082     return 1;
00083 }
00084 
00085 /* return true if the element should be hidden/shown */
00086 static int is_effected(PartialVisArea area,
00087                        float planes[4][4],
00088                        const float co[3])
00089 {
00090     if (area == PARTIALVIS_ALL)
00091         return 1;
00092     else {
00093         int inside = planes_contain_v3(planes, 4, co);
00094         return ((inside && area == PARTIALVIS_INSIDE) ||
00095                 (!inside && area == PARTIALVIS_OUTSIDE));
00096     }
00097 }
00098 
00099 static void partialvis_update_mesh(Object *ob,
00100                                    PBVH *pbvh,
00101                                    PBVHNode *node,
00102                                    PartialVisAction action,
00103                                    PartialVisArea area,
00104                                    float planes[4][4])
00105 {
00106     MVert *mvert;
00107     int *vert_indices;
00108     int any_changed = 0, any_visible = 0, totvert, i;
00109             
00110     BLI_pbvh_node_num_verts(pbvh, node, NULL, &totvert);
00111     BLI_pbvh_node_get_verts(pbvh, node, &vert_indices, &mvert);
00112 
00113     sculpt_undo_push_node(ob, node, SCULPT_UNDO_HIDDEN);
00114 
00115     for (i = 0; i < totvert; i++) {
00116         MVert *v = &mvert[vert_indices[i]];
00117 
00118         /* hide vertex if in the hide volume */
00119         if (is_effected(area, planes, v->co)) {
00120             if (action == PARTIALVIS_HIDE)
00121                 v->flag |= ME_HIDE;
00122             else
00123                 v->flag &= ~ME_HIDE;
00124             any_changed = 1;
00125         }
00126 
00127         if (!(v->flag & ME_HIDE))
00128             any_visible = 1;
00129     }
00130 
00131     if (any_changed) {
00132         BLI_pbvh_node_mark_rebuild_draw(node);
00133         BLI_pbvh_node_fully_hidden_set(node, !any_visible);
00134     }
00135 }
00136 
00137 /* Hide or show elements in multires grids with a special GridFlags
00138  * customdata layer. */
00139 static void partialvis_update_grids(Object *ob,
00140                                     PBVH *pbvh,
00141                                     PBVHNode *node,
00142                                     PartialVisAction action,
00143                                     PartialVisArea area,
00144                                     float planes[4][4])
00145 {
00146     DMGridData **grids;
00147     BLI_bitmap *grid_hidden;
00148     int any_visible = 0;
00149     int *grid_indices, gridsize, totgrid, any_changed, i;
00150 
00151     /* get PBVH data */
00152     BLI_pbvh_node_get_grids(pbvh, node,
00153                             &grid_indices, &totgrid, NULL, &gridsize,
00154                             &grids, NULL);
00155     grid_hidden = BLI_pbvh_grid_hidden(pbvh);
00156     
00157     sculpt_undo_push_node(ob, node, SCULPT_UNDO_HIDDEN);
00158     
00159     any_changed = 0;
00160     for (i = 0; i < totgrid; i++) {
00161         int any_hidden = 0;
00162         int g = grid_indices[i], x, y;
00163         BLI_bitmap gh = grid_hidden[g];
00164 
00165         if (!gh) {
00166             switch (action) {
00167                 case PARTIALVIS_HIDE:
00168                     /* create grid flags data */
00169                     gh = grid_hidden[g] = BLI_BITMAP_NEW(gridsize * gridsize,
00170                                                          "partialvis_update_grids");
00171                     break;
00172                 case PARTIALVIS_SHOW:
00173                     /* entire grid is visible, nothing to show */
00174                     continue;
00175             }
00176         }
00177         else if (action == PARTIALVIS_SHOW && area == PARTIALVIS_ALL) {
00178             /* special case if we're showing all, just free the
00179              * grid */
00180             MEM_freeN(gh);
00181             grid_hidden[g] = NULL;
00182             any_changed = 1;
00183             any_visible = 1;
00184             continue;
00185         }
00186 
00187         for (y = 0; y < gridsize; y++) {
00188             for (x = 0; x < gridsize; x++) {
00189                 const float *co = grids[g][y * gridsize + x].co;
00190 
00191                 /* skip grid element if not in the effected area */
00192                 if (is_effected(area, planes, co)) {
00193                     /* set or clear the hide flag */
00194                     BLI_BITMAP_MODIFY(gh, y * gridsize + x,
00195                                       action == PARTIALVIS_HIDE);
00196 
00197                     any_changed = 1;
00198                 }
00199 
00200                 /* keep track of whether any elements are still hidden */
00201                 if (BLI_BITMAP_GET(gh, y * gridsize + x))
00202                     any_hidden = 1;
00203                 else
00204                     any_visible = 1;
00205             }
00206         }
00207 
00208         /* if everything in the grid is now visible, free the grid
00209          * flags */
00210         if (!any_hidden) {
00211             MEM_freeN(gh);
00212             grid_hidden[g] = NULL;
00213         }
00214     }
00215 
00216     /* mark updates if anything was hidden/shown */
00217     if (any_changed) {
00218         BLI_pbvh_node_mark_rebuild_draw(node);
00219         BLI_pbvh_node_fully_hidden_set(node, !any_visible);
00220         multires_mark_as_modified(ob, MULTIRES_HIDDEN_MODIFIED);
00221     }
00222 }

00224 static void rect_from_props(rcti *rect, PointerRNA *ptr)
00225 {
00226     rect->xmin = RNA_int_get(ptr, "xmin");
00227     rect->ymin = RNA_int_get(ptr, "ymin");
00228     rect->xmax = RNA_int_get(ptr, "xmax");
00229     rect->ymax = RNA_int_get(ptr, "ymax");
00230 }
00231 
00232 static void clip_planes_from_rect(bContext *C,
00233                                   float clip_planes[4][4],
00234                                   const rcti *rect)
00235 {
00236     ViewContext vc;
00237     BoundBox bb;
00238     bglMats mats = {{0}};
00239     
00240     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
00241     view3d_set_viewcontext(C, &vc);
00242     view3d_get_transformation(vc.ar, vc.rv3d, vc.obact, &mats);
00243     ED_view3d_calc_clipping(&bb, clip_planes, &mats, rect);
00244     mul_m4_fl(clip_planes, -1.0f);
00245 }
00246 
00247 /* If mode is inside, get all PBVH nodes that lie at least partially
00248  * inside the clip_planes volume. If mode is outside, get all nodes
00249  * that lie at least partially outside the volume. If showing all, get
00250  * all nodes. */
00251 static void get_pbvh_nodes(PBVH *pbvh,
00252                            PBVHNode ***nodes,
00253                            int *totnode,
00254                            float clip_planes[4][4],
00255                            PartialVisArea mode)
00256 {
00257     BLI_pbvh_SearchCallback cb;
00258 
00259     /* select search callback */
00260     switch (mode) {
00261         case PARTIALVIS_INSIDE:
00262             cb = BLI_pbvh_node_planes_contain_AABB;
00263             break;
00264         case PARTIALVIS_OUTSIDE:
00265             cb = BLI_pbvh_node_planes_exclude_AABB;
00266             break;
00267         case PARTIALVIS_ALL:
00268             cb = NULL;
00269     }
00270     
00271     BLI_pbvh_search_gather(pbvh, cb, clip_planes, nodes, totnode);
00272 }
00273 
00274 static int hide_show_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00275 {
00276     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00277     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00278     Mesh *me = ob->data;
00279     PartialVisAction action;
00280     PartialVisArea area;
00281     PBVH *pbvh;
00282     PBVHNode **nodes;
00283     DerivedMesh *dm;
00284     PBVHType pbvh_type;
00285     float clip_planes[4][4];
00286     rcti rect;
00287     int totnode, i;
00288 
00289     /* read operator properties */
00290     action = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "action");
00291     area = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "area");
00292     rect_from_props(&rect, op->ptr);
00293 
00294     clip_planes_from_rect(C, clip_planes, &rect);
00295 
00296     dm = mesh_get_derived_final(CTX_data_scene(C), ob, CD_MASK_BAREMESH);
00297     pbvh = dm->getPBVH(ob, dm);
00298     ob->sculpt->pbvh = pbvh;
00299 
00300     get_pbvh_nodes(pbvh, &nodes, &totnode, clip_planes, area);
00301     pbvh_type = BLI_pbvh_type(pbvh);
00302 
00303     /* start undo */
00304     switch (action) {
00305         case PARTIALVIS_HIDE:
00306             sculpt_undo_push_begin("Hide area");
00307             break;
00308         case PARTIALVIS_SHOW:
00309             sculpt_undo_push_begin("Show area");
00310             break;
00311     }
00312 
00313     for (i = 0; i < totnode; i++) {
00314         switch (pbvh_type) {
00315             case PBVH_FACES:
00316                 partialvis_update_mesh(ob, pbvh, nodes[i], action, area, clip_planes);
00317                 break;
00318             case PBVH_GRIDS:
00319                 partialvis_update_grids(ob, pbvh, nodes[i], action, area, clip_planes);
00320                 break;
00321         }
00322     }
00323 
00324     if (nodes)
00325         MEM_freeN(nodes);
00326     
00327     /* end undo */
00328     sculpt_undo_push_end();
00329 
00330     /* ensure that edges and faces get hidden as well (not used by
00331      * sculpt but it looks wrong when entering editmode otherwise) */
00332     if (pbvh_type == PBVH_FACES) {
00333         mesh_flush_hidden_from_verts(me->mvert, me->mloop,
00334                                      me->medge, me->totedge,
00335                                      me->mpoly, me->totpoly);
00336     }
00337 
00338     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00339     
00340     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00341 }
00342 
00343 static int hide_show_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00344 {
00345     PartialVisArea area = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "area");
00346 
00347     if (area != PARTIALVIS_ALL)
00348         return WM_border_select_invoke(C, op, event);
00349     else
00350         return op->type->exec(C, op);
00351 }
00352 
00353 void PAINT_OT_hide_show(struct wmOperatorType *ot)
00354 {
00355     static EnumPropertyItem action_items[] = {
00356         {PARTIALVIS_HIDE, "HIDE", 0, "Hide", "Hide vertices"},
00357         {PARTIALVIS_SHOW, "SHOW", 0, "Show", "Show vertices"},
00358         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00359 
00360     static EnumPropertyItem area_items[] = {
00361         {PARTIALVIS_OUTSIDE, "OUTSIDE", 0, "Outside", "Hide or show vertices outside the selection"},
00362         {PARTIALVIS_INSIDE, "INSIDE", 0, "Inside", "Hide or show vertices inside the selection"},
00363         {PARTIALVIS_ALL, "ALL", 0, "All", "Hide or show all vertices"},
00364         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00365     
00366     /* identifiers */
00367     ot->name = "Hide/Show";
00368     ot->idname = "PAINT_OT_hide_show";
00369 
00370     /* api callbacks */
00371     ot->invoke = hide_show_invoke;
00372     ot->modal = WM_border_select_modal;
00373     ot->exec = hide_show_exec;
00374     /* sculpt-only for now */
00375     ot->poll = sculpt_mode_poll;
00376 
00377     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER;
00378 
00379     /* rna */
00380     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "action", action_items, PARTIALVIS_HIDE,
00381                  "Action", "Whether to hide or show vertices");
00382     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "area", area_items, PARTIALVIS_INSIDE,
00383                  "Area", "Which vertices to hide or show");
00384     
00385     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "xmin", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "X Min", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
00386     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "xmax", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "X Max", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
00387     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "ymin", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Y Min", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
00388     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "ymax", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Y Max", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
00389 }
